name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ultra light newtab page with bookmarks on it

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ultra light new tab with bookmark navigator

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension gives you a much simpler new tab page with lightweight bookmarks navigation. New tabs are getting faster, but still functional and useful. Visit options page to tune font size and customize bookmarks subfolder. Try to use <Shift>+Click to open links in new tabs and <Ctrl>+Click to open link in new tab without focus switching.
